en_text: For 2 turns, increase ATK by 30% for each [L] Increased Attack awakening skill on the team

jp_skill.name: やっちゃえ、バーサーカー
jp_skill.raw_description: 2ターンの間、チーム内のL字消し攻撃の覚醒数に応じて 攻撃力が上昇。

kr_skill.name: 해치워 버려… 버서커!
kr_skill.raw_description: 2턴 동안 팀 내의 L자 지움 공격의 각성수에 따라 공격력이 상승

na_skill.name: Get them, Berserker!
na_skill.raw_description: ATK increases by the number of [L Increased Attack] Awoken Skills in team for 2 turns
